review: Dr was good he asked us the problem, he suggested some tests to be done and wrote for a followup, we will visit him once again with the reports

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Fully satisfied with this doctor's treatment of my heart disease. He examines patients thoroughly *** *********  ********** **********  ****  *** ********* *** *** **** ******** ********** Gives good advise to keep our heart in healthy condition. I strongly recommend this doctor for all our heart related issues. A must visit doctor for any of our heart problems.

The doctor is cool and calm in understanding the root cause of the issue
Pleasant experience with him
We had a great experience at Omni kukatpally. Dr  T. Pramod Rao is a wonderful cardiologist. He was attentive, informative, kind, highly supportive and gave incredible care. I thank you sir.

I'm very thankful  to Dr.Pramod Kumar Rao, Sr.Cardiologist,  Omni Hospitals,Kukatpally.  Even Hospital staff served nice. Good hospitality given. Dedicated services rendered to my mother. God blesses to all the staff.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Myself and my wife met the doctor for cardiology check up on 29.4.23 .  Though our comment i too early but still we wish to  make the first impression.

  Doctor is very really friendly and feel that  has a human approach.  Spends time  with the patients which rarely see with other top doctors.  We really felt we approached the right doctor for our heart health.    We hope we never be disappointed in the days to come for our heart related problems.  we wish the doctor very best.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Fully satisfied with  Dr pramood kumar and his  treatment of my wife blood pressure . 
He examines patients thoroughly  and gives good advise to keep our heart in healthy condition. 
I strongly recommend this doctor for all our heart related issues. A must visit doctor for any of our heart problems.
His explanation on problem is excellent . 
Iam very much thankful to the doctor for  his treatment for me and wife .

I visited OMNI hospital kukatpally, with my uncle as he had a pain in the heart region. 

The Doctor was not in time. Instead of him other doctor Mr. XYZ took his place (may be his fellow doctor, we felt he is the actual doctor). After our consultation with Mr.XYZ, the actual doctor came at 11:00am and read the lab reports suggested the medication.

The Doctor explained everything well, but, if he could manage himself in time will be appreciated.

Thank you.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr. Prams kumar sir is a fantastic physician in their professional and I never ever seen such professionism and humanism with patience to explain & diagnos. He diagnosis the right issues & recommends * ***** treatment with appropriate medicine. I will recommend who ever needs for the health related treatments.

Excellent...very patient and very humble.. Listens to all your issues and does complete examination.. You will come out of the clinic satisfied  and happy.. I myself am a general physician would recommend him...
Dr was good he asked us the problem, he suggested some tests to be done and wrote for a followup, we will visit him once again with the reports
